Old Bestsellers Lists

Find your next read while it's still popular!

Right now, we're only searching Boston Public Library's catalog. What's more, I'm displaying all the books, not just the available ones, even though I have that data! This is due to a limitation in the NYT API which has forced me to start writing a backend with access to a long-term storage solution. It's not great, and it's not done yet, so this bit isn't entirely functional. Check out the console for proof that the functionality is there, just not displayed in a pretty format! And stay tuned for updates!
